question: India signed four agreements with this country including on air services and merchant shipping.
explanation: India and Cyprus today signed four pacts for air services and cooperation in merchant shipping. The agreement was exchanged between External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj and Cyprus's Finance Minister Harris Georgiades in the presence of Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Cypriot President Nicos Anastasiades. The two countries also signed an agreement on Executive Programme on Culture Education and Scientific Cooperation (EPCEC) for the year 2017-2020.
